header: Jesus Teaches about the Faith of a Child (A)

verse: At that time the followers came to Jesus. They said, “Who is the greatest in the holy nation of heaven?”
Jesus took a little child and put him among them.
He said, “For sure, I tell you, unless you have a change of heart and become like a little child, you will not get into the holy nation of heaven.

header: What to Do with a Brother Who Sins Against You

verse: Then Peter came to Jesus and said, “Lord, how many times may my brother sin against me and I forgive him, up to seven times?”
Jesus said to him, “I tell you, not seven times but seventy times seven!
